name: Ultra Exaggerated Medieval Shooter
description:
History :

You play as a mage that was banned from the magic academy for making some trouble so you have to unban yourself paying a lot of gold, play in 5 different levels, unlocking them while you win and kill the final boss.

Features :

*7 different maps.
*Multiple power ups.
*6 enemies.
*random generated background decoration.
*there is a extra level that challenges the player to see how many time can survive.

Hi, this is my first game made in Unity so you may experience some errors or weird stuff, lack of music and not too much sounds but i plan to give more updates to the game meanwhile i learn more, so feel free to write your opinion in the comments.

i hope you enjoy this mini game ! ! !
